Home » 40P17 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
26 Pītittika, Kusalattika
Pītittika, Kusalattika
43.
119Pītisahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  satta.
120Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  satta.
121Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  satta.
122Hetuyā ekavīsati, adhipatiyā ekavīsati…pe…  avigate ekavīsati. (Vedanāttikasadisaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
